content: But I would always want to remind you, even though it’s a sentimental favor, it’s a little less than $2 million in revenue for us. It’s really about, let’s call it, $28 million because there was $1 million of sales on the 9x program, which is not an active program for us right now and dormant. It still gives us $13.3 million, let’s say, to $14.3 million, which is higher than the $12.75 million to $13.25 million.
